name: java
content:
Java noun
(COMPUTER LANGUAGE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] trademark the name of a computer programming language that is often used on the internet: The applications are written in Java. It takes a sophisticated programmer to create Java code.

Java noun
(ISLAND)
a large island that forms part of Indonesia: A tsunami has hit the Indonesian island of Java. The new species was discovered on Flores Island, east of Java.

Java noun
(COFFEE)
[ U or C ] US informal (also java) coffee: She was enjoying her morning cup of Java. I couldn't give up my daily java.
